posts.postText:
I posted a ban request on purple Haze. He rdmed the server multiple rounds and in one of the rounds he rdmed 7 people. He was also calling people niggers. Why did he recieve only a 1 week ban. 

I know that i should have format ,but all the info is in my other ban request and revoked's
You don't choose the length of the ban, it is chosen by the admin. He was banned for that time based on the information that was given.
